articles.title: Wimbledon: Kate given standing ovation at men's singles final - BBC.com
articles.description: The princess presented defending champion Carlos Alcaraz with the tennis final trophy on Sunday.
articles.content: The Princess of Wales was given a standing ovation at Centre Court where she watched the Wimbledon men's singles final between Carlos Alcaraz and Novak Djokovic with her daughter Princess Charlotte.… [+1438 chars]
